page.title: 10TRANSPORT
page.content:
{All figures relate to 300 households {surveyed
{ ITEM |}PERCENTAGE {______________________________________ {PRIVATE CAR OWNERS | }59.16 {PRIVATE VEHICLES(OTHERS)| }8.84 {DRIVING LICENCE OWNERS | }84.00 {PRIVATE CARS (HOLIDAYS) | }58.00 {CARS TOO EXPENSIVE(IDEAS| }72.00 {ROAD QUALITY POOR(IDEAS)| }81.00 {RELY ON PUBLIC TRANSPORT|} 49.00 {______________________________________ 55% of regular users of public transport think services are reliable. bus stops are adequately provided but railway stations are too few. A new local railway station is planned. 79% think that public transport is reasonably priced. It is subsidised by Merseyside County Council.
